column5: Hi All, Does anyone have any current information on the condition of the lake, weed growth, recent fishing, lake traffic etc? I know that it has received lots of pressure in recent years from bass tournaments. How easy is it to access the rest of the Trent System?
invasive weeds are getting worse but still Pike and bass to be had, it is part of the Trent Severn water way so you can travel the whole system from there
